channel.title: mbAInewsletter
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from mbAInewsletter, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks End Higher After Trump Plays Down Intentions to Fire Powell
item.description: Markets rebounded after Trump denied plans to fire Fed Chair Jerome Powell.

item.title: Trading Day: Trump-Powell drama sizzles, dollar fizzles
item.description: A rumor-driven volatility spike gives investors a preview of Fed-policy fragility.

item.title: Featured Post - WSJ Market Coverage
item.description: Live updates on market response to Trump’s Powell remarks and macro sentiment.

item.title: Global Markets View: Policy Risks Rise Amid Political Uncertainty
item.description: Central banks in focus as investors weigh political pressures on monetary policy.
